speaker.name: Tony Robbins
speaker.shortintro: Tony Robbins (February 29, 1960) is an American author, entrepreneur, philanthropist and life coach. Robbins is known for his infomercials, seminars, and self-help books including Unlimited Power and Awaken the Giant Within. Approximately 4 million people have attended his live seminars.

speaker.name: Shiv Khera
speaker.shortintro: Shiv Khera is an Indian author of self-help books, including You Can Win, and an activist. He launched a movement against caste-based reservation in India.

speaker.name: Suze Orman
speaker.shortintro: Susan Lynn 'Suze' Orman is an American author, financial advisor, motivational speaker, and television host. She earned a degree in social work then worked as a financial advisor for Merrill Lynch.
